replies.bodyText: this is testing that the behavior of block() is consistent, especially since the processor-specific implementation was removed in the commit.
replies.author: simonbasle

replies.bodyText: perhaps it should be a dedicated test then? Not a big deal but I was first confused to see block() used given that it is an empty processor that should not emit anything, and only then I noticed isNull(), so it is a bit counterintuitive when you read the test :)
replies.author: bsideup

replies.bodyText: ooops, sorry, I missed that! Although then we miss tests for "normal" subscribe on asMono() :)
replies.author: bsideup

replies.bodyText: ah, yeah we tried to improve the test coverage but that fell through I guess
replies.author: simonbasle

timeline.message: add missing test on regular subscribe
